attributes.action: Allow motorcycles to use bus lanes
attributes.additional_details: The motorcycle community a fairly large and I'm sure they will agree this is a good petition and it will benefit all road users and give cars more road room
attributes.background:
Motorcycles should be able to use bus lanes as it would be quicker for bikes to filter and a safer way to keep from the traffic as you know a lot of motorcycle accidents happen

They don't take up much room so the buses and taxis can still use them,no more room than a push bike which you allow
